flavor: “Murakumogou, famed sword forged by Gou no Yoshihiro. My old master was said to be a bad person, and my price is cheap. ...Where is Ame-san? I'm fine if I am with him.”

name: Mikazuki Munechika Sentou
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 2 card with "Mikazuki Munechika" in its card name, look at the top two cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 2 or less card from among them, call it to (RC), and put any number of the remaining cards on the top or bottom of the deck in any order.
flavor: “Let's get started.”

name: Honebami Toushirou Kiwame
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a <Touken Danshi - Uchigatana> , this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.

name: Hirano Toushirou Kiwame
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), you may draw a card. If you drew a card, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.

name: Gotou Toushirou Kiwame
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Soul-Blast 2], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Shinano Toushirou Kiwame
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into soul], draw a card, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Maeda Toushirou Kiwame
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card.

name: Akita Toushirou Kiwame
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][discard a card from hand], and [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Hakata Toushirou Kiwame
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle this unit boosted a rear-guard, if you have a "Tantou's Ability Kiwame" crest, your opponent cannot call grade 1 or greater cards from hand to (GC).[AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card.

name: Yagen Toushirou Kiwame
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][[Rest] this unit], choose two cards with "Toushirou" or "Gokotai" in their card names from your drop, and put them into soul.

name: Fudou Yukimitsu Kiwame
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a grade 2 or greater unit, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of the deck. If it boosted a <Touken Danshi - Uchigatana> , this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.

name: Hanjin
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your opponent's back row rear-guard is retired during your turn, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: “I am Hanjin, the Wakizashi of Sanada Saemonnosuke Nobushige. Alongside Oochidori Juumonji Yari, I seek to stand in battle in the name of Sanada.“

name: Houchou Toushirou Kiwame
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit gets [Power] +2000 for each of your other units with "Toushirou", "Gokotai", or "Ichigo Hitofuri" in its card name. (Active on opponent's turn too)

name: Mouri Toushirou Kiwame
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your vanguard's grade is less than your opponent's vanguard's grade, [Counter-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Shield] +5000 until end of that battle.

name: Mikazuki Munechika Ubu Form
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: “I'm Mikazuki Munechika. My name comes from the crescent moon shapes on my blade. Nice to meet you.”

name: Hirano Toushirou
flavor: “I am Hirano Toushirou. Please allow me to accompany you.”

name: Atsushi Toushirou
flavor: “Oh, hey there. The name's Atsushi Toushirou. I'm what's known in the business as an armor breaker.”

name: Gotou Toushirou
flavor: “Hey, I'm Gotou Toushirou. I know, I know; pretty tall for a tantou, right!”

name: Maeda Toushirou
flavor: “Greetings. My name is Maeda Toushirou. I shall serve you in perpetuity.”

name: Akita Toushirou
flavor: “Hi, hi, I'm Akita Toushirou. Wow, the outside is so pretty!”

name: Yagen Toushirou
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: “Hey, Captain. The name's Yagen Toushirou. Looking forward to working with ya.”

name: Forge
effect: (After a set order is played, put it into the order zone)[CONT]Order Zone:The [ACT] ability of "Forge" may only be used a total of one time a turn.[ACT]Order Zone[1/turn]:[COST][Put a card other than [Heal] trigger and [Over] trigger from drop on the bottom of the deck], reveal cards from the top of your deck until the same number of normal units as the number of "Forge" in your order zone is revealed, choose one of the revealed normal units, and call it to (RC) as [Rest]. If that called unit's grade is less than or equal to your vanguard, [Stand] that unit, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for every other normal unit revealed by this effect. Shuffle the deck.
